list.title: AuthProvider.login
list.description:
Login the user

This method is used to login the user

list.title: cn
list.description: A utility function to merge Tailwind CSS classes

list.title: module:Beacon
list.description: A module to dispatch and listen to events.

list.title: module:Beacon.beacon
list.description:
Dispatch a beacon event.

This method allows dispatching an event that other parts of the application can listen to.

list.title: module:Beacon.listenBeacon
list.description:
Listen for a beacon event.

This method allows listening for an event of type "beacon."

list.title: module:Hooks.useAudioPlayer
list.description: A custom hook to handle audio playback.

list.title: module:Storage.exports.getSession
list.description: Get the session linked to the user like `key-sessionId`

list.title: module:Storage.exports.setLocalStorage
list.description: Use local storage to save data

list.title: module:Storage.exports.storeSession
list.description: Save the session linked to the user like `key-sessionId`

list.title: useAudioPlayer.revoke
list.description:
Revoke the audio

This method is used to revoke the audio, it stop and dequene the audio to
avoid memory leaks.

list.title: useClickOutside
list.description: A custom hook to handle click outside events.
